Text: Hey dude - I've been dowloading your stuff for a while now and I created an account just to say thanks - you are a star for uploading all the latest comics - you da man!

Just wanted to say HAPPY 4TH brother!!! You do so much for all of us on here in the community and we absolutely LOVE your comics and so much appreciate your hard work and dedication to keeping us filled to the brim with freaking awesome uploads! You are a great guy! Thanks from all of us! Wish you and yours the best Independence Day!!
